home.bio: Leveraging a background in Japanese linguistics to bring a unique perspective to crafting intuitive digital experiences.
home.bio2: Passionate about the intersection of beautiful design and robust infrastructure, I like to make pretty things that are gonna work for a long time. Currently exploring UI/UX, cloud solutions, chaos engineering, and network security.
home.bio3: I am a Le Wagon alumni whose
home.leWagonLink: final project was voted one of the best apps from all Le Wagon campuses.

dreamhero.name: Dream Hero
dreamhero.description: AI bedtime story app that allows you to choose your own adventure and insert your own characters that the story adapts around.

kokai.name: Kokai Soundworks
kokai.description: One-stop-platform for musicians to find bands, fund gigs, and fill venues. Voted one of the best projects out of all Le Wagon campuses.

kakehashi.name: Kakehashi Visa
kakehashi.description: A platform to make it easy for Japanese immigration lawyers to work together with foreign nationals in securing their visas.

eris.name: ERIS
eris.description: Local chaos engineering platform with Docker containers, Prometheus monitoring, and Grafana dashboards for testing system resilience.

nyx.name: NYX
nyx.description: AWS serverless chaos engineering platform. Upload files to S3, Lambda processes them, stores metadata in DynamoDB. Inject failures and watch what happens.

hecate.name: HECATE
hecate.description: Chaos engineering project using AWS FIS to test infrastructure resilience. Deploys a Flask app on EC2 with auto scaling, then runs chaos experiments to verify self-healing.

translations.title: Translations
translations.intro: Japanese to English translation work for government bodies and academic institutions, specializing in official statements, policy documents, and educational content.

nptStatement.title: Mayor's Statement at NPT Review Conference
nptStatement.description: Statement by the Mayor of Nagasaki at the First Preparatory Committee for the 11th NPT Review Conference in Vienna, advocating for nuclear disarmament and sharing the realities of atomic bombings.

subcriticalProtest.title: Protest Against U.S. Subcritical Nuclear Tests
subcriticalProtest.description: Formal protest letter from Nagasaki City to the U.S. President opposing subcritical nuclear tests conducted at Nevada's testing site, urging leadership toward nuclear abolition.

russiaProtest.title: Protest Against Russia's Nuclear Threats
russiaProtest.description: Joint protest from the mayors of Hiroshima and Nagasaki to the Russian President opposing the invasion of Ukraine and rhetoric suggesting potential nuclear weapon deployment.
